interaction_challenge_gift_start.other: <view style="background-color:linear-gradient(#f7a15f,#ed528e);is-corner:1"><text style="color:#ffffff;font-size:2"> Steamer will challenge {{.Content}} after collecting {{.TargetNum}} {{.GiftName}} </text></view>

interaction_challenge_light_up_start.other: <view style="background-color:linear-gradient(#f7a15f,#ed528e);is-corner:1"><text style="color:#ffffff;font-size:2"> Steamer will challenge {{.Content}} after collecting {{.TargetNum}} tap </text></view>

interaction_challenge_close.other: <view style="background-color:linear-gradient(#f7a15f,#ed528e);is-corner:1"><text style="color:#ffffff;font-size:2"> Streamer has stopped the challenge.</text></view>

interaction_challenge_close_success_coll.other: <view style="background-color:linear-gradient(#f7a15f,#ed528e);is-corner:1"><text style="color:#ffffff;font-size:2"> Challenge is Over. Thanks for joining. </text></view>

interaction_challenge_collect_failed.other: <view style="background-color:linear-gradient(#f7a15f,#ed528e);is-corner:1"><text style="color:#ffffff;font-size:2"> Streamer failed. Can't do the challenge. What a pity. </text></view>

interaction_vote_start.other: <view style="background-color:linear-gradient(#f7a15f,#ed528e);is-corner:1"><text style="color:#ffffff;font-size:2"> Streamer starts a vote. Quick to join! </text></view>

interaction_vote_close.other: <view style="background-color:linear-gradient(#f7a15f,#ed528e);is-corner:1"><text style="color:#ffffff;font-size:2"> Streamer has ended the vote. </text></view>

repeat_start_interaction.other: You have started a game. Please end it before start a new one.

guest_reward_tips.other: 在多人連線中，用戶給嘉賓送的禮物可兌換成美金收入，當前匯率1coin=0.001088美金，請在"我的"-"余額"查看收入詳情。
